LanguageData.MO_Nauseated.stages.0.label: Nauseated
LanguageData.MO_Nauseated.stages.0.description: I'm so sick and tired out of sudden... I need rest.
LanguageData.MO_HadStroke.stages.0.label: Experienced stroke
LanguageData.MO_HadStroke.stages.0.description: I suddenly felt down and lost control. My body hurts, what happened?
LanguageData.MO_Amnesia.stages.0.label: Blackout
LanguageData.MO_Amnesia.stages.0.description: I suddenly forgot everything, that's not good.
